import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import {Card,CardBody} from 'react-bootstrap' import './tour-card.css' const TourCard = ({tour}) => { const {id,title,city, photo,price,avgRating,reviews} = tour //ignore featured return
Featured
{city} {avgRating} ({reviews.length})
{title}
â‚¹{price} /per person
} export default TourCard
